actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in League of Women Voters  v. Federal Communications Commission.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel, pursuant to the Ethics in Government Act of 1978, to appear amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in League of Women Voters v. Federal Communications Commission.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in League of Women Voters  v. Federal Communications Commission.
